teacher desk

testcase.pdpshortdesc: In this bouncy, busy book, kids get to count along as snowmen—and winter fun—add up and up and up.
testcase.pdplongdesc: As the rhyming text introduces the activities of each new group, an equation shows just how many snowmen there are on the page. Seven snowmen are snowshoeing next to eight fort-building snowmen, so readers discover that 7 + 8 = 15. The groupings of snowmen help readers see the different ways numbers can add up, and the charming illustrations and equations demonstrate a math trick that adds all the way up to 100.
